text.autoconfig.locator-heads.title: Locator Heads Settings
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.ren: Toggle rendering of player head icons (names may still show)
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.alw: Always show the XP bar even when the locator bar is active
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.sho: Display a compass overlay on the locator bar
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.com: Custom colour for the compass direction letters (supports hex)
Show black outline around compass letters for better visibility
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.ena: Show colored borders around player heads based on their team or a static color
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.bor: Use team color or a static chosen color for borders (and name tint)
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.sta: Custom colour for static border (supports hex)
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.hea: Scale the size of player heads
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.sho: Choose when to display player names above their heads
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.pla: Choose which players to show heads for
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.inc: Enter player names separated by commas (e.g., Player1,Player2,Player3)
text.autoconfig.locator-heads.option.exc: Enter player names separated by commas (e.g., Player1,Player2,Player3)
